reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 174/07: TAX MATTERS - 2007 TIME LIMITS FOR CERTAIN BY-LAWS
reg_info.reg_name_text: TAX MATTERS — 2007 TIME LIMITS FOR CERTAIN BY-LAWS
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 174/07: TAX MATTERS - 2007 TIME LIMITS FOR CERTAIN BY-LAWS
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act, 2001   Loi de 2001 sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. The time limits for 2007 under subsections 308 (4) and (5), 308.1 (4) and (5), 310 (7), 311 (2) and (4), 314 (1), 329.1 (2) and 362 (1) of the Act are extended to June 30, 2007. O. Reg. 174/07, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The time limits for 2007 under subsections 308 (4) and (5), 308.1 (4) and (5), 310 (7), 311 (2) and (4), 314 (1), 329.1 (2) and 362 (1) of the Act are extended to June 30, 2007. O. Reg. 174/07, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 174/07, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 174/07, s. 2.
